faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Foundation Verification Platform

teaching.question: Do you teach English?
teaching.answer: No, we don't teach English. We are a verification platform, not a teaching platform. Children learn elsewhere (school, cram school), we verify if they recognize foundation elements.

different.question: How are you different from teaching apps?
different.answer: Teaching apps teach, we verify results. We provide objective third-party verification, verifying if your education investment actually worked.

verify.question: What do you verify?
verify.answer: We verify if children recognize foundation elements (words, phrases, idioms). We verify recognition ability, not deep understanding (that's our future goal). Recognition is the foundation of understanding.

scholarship.question: How does the verification scholarship work?
scholarship.answer: Parents deposit NT$500-1,000 as verification scholarship deposit. After children pass verification tests, scholarship unlocks. Parents can withdraw anytime. Meet verification standards, 100% refund.

scam.question: Isn't this a scam?
scam.answer: No. We are an educational verification platform, not a cash flow verification platform. Your money is in platform escrow account, unlocks after child verification. Business model is completely transparent, withdrawable anytime.

withdraw.question: Can money really be withdrawn anytime?
withdraw.answer: Yes. Zero handling fees, arrives within 1 day after linking bank account. This is your money, not ours. You have full control.

methodology.question: Why is your verification method better?
methodology.answer: We use Knowledge Graph structure (relationship-based), not alphabetical order. Spaced repetition verification (Day 3, 7, 14) ensures long-term recognition, not short-term memory. 99.54% confidence, not 25% guessing rate.

gap.question: Why stay ahead of official numbers?
gap.answer: Official numbers say senior high needs 4,000-5,000 words, but reality expects 8,000+. Meeting only official numbers = actually behind. We help you verify if your child is truly ahead, ready to face real expectations.
